mapper.select: SELECT M.USERNAME, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, R.NUM, R.ROLENAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON (M.USERNAME = MR.USERNAME) INNER JOIN ROLE R ON (MR.NUM = R.NUM) WHERE M.USERNAME=#{userName} AND M.PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH, ENABLED) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{enabled})
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME=#{userName}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET LASTTIME=now() WHERE USERNAME=#{userName}
UPDATE MEMBER SET ENABLED = 0 WHERE LASTTIME <= now()-INTERVAL 3 DAY
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE DAYOFYEAR(BIRTH)=DAYOFYEAR(NOW())
